name: Innominds Software Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: outsourced-software-product-development, , enterprise--consumer-mobile-application-development, mobile-platform-services, mobile-device-creation, mobile-2-0, mobile-browser-development, webkit, html-5, software-testing, enterprise-software, cloud--big-dat
overview:
Innominds provides accelerated innovation in the software product engineering and R&D space. Ranging from software product development to mobile device creation, our core competency areas include security solutions, Cloud and big data, Mobility, Platform services, Embedded software, Independednt software testing. For 14 years, we have been working with leading ISV’s, OEM’s as well as Innovative startup’s which makes us have the unique perspective and hence the edge. Our engineering services expertise helps ISV’s, device makers, silicon vendors, technology companies deliver compelling products with faster time-to-market. With head office in San Jose and ODC’s in Hyderabad and Bengaluru, we provide flexible engagement models.

With the expertise we gained over the past 14 years we have solution accelerators and frameworks for every industry.

Mobile and embedded - Our strength lies in the vast resource base we have which enables us to offer services spanning:

• Enterprise and consumer mobile applications across all major mobile platforms. • Mobile software product development. • Platform services for mobile, other handheld and embedded devices. • Mobile Device creation. • Create hardware design solutions.

Services for ISV’s:

We offer end to end product engineering services for ISV’s. Our expertise in open source technologies like java, Ruby on rails, etc. as well as leading technologies Microsoft technologies, oracle products, etc. helps us deliver excellent services.
